thread.title: Who Wins From Standard Life Aberdeen-Phoenix Deal

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Who Wins From Standard Life Aberdeen-Phoenix Deal

organizations.name: standard life aberdeen-phoenix deal standard life aberdeen

text:
Standard Life Aberdeen thinks shedding its insurance arm will unlock value. But what is left behind is an asset manager with high costs and investor outflows. Both need fixing, fast.

In a £3 billion ($4 billion) deal that continues the trend of life insurance atomizing into asset managers and risk managers, Standard Life Aberdeen is selling its remaining insurance business to U.K.-listed Phoenix Group. Taking the leap could ultimately boost Standard Life Aberdeen’s share valuation, as asset managers tend to trade for a higher...
